e15190.utilities.timer.pause(show=False)¶

Pause the timer.

Parameters

show – bool, optional Whether to print the elapsed time accummulated at the time of pausing.

e15190.utilities.timer.reset()¶

Reset the timer.

e15190.utilities.timer.start()¶

Start the timer.

e15190.utilities.timer.stop(prefix=None, suffix=None, show=True)¶

Stop the timer.

Parameters

  • prefix (str, optional) – Prefix to print before the elapsed time.

  • suffix (str, optional) – Suffix to print after the elapsed time.

  • show (bool, optional) – Whether to print the elapsed time.

Returns

Elapsed time in seconds.

Return type

float
